translations: 古希腊、古罗马文学（classic 的复数）

sentences.sentence: The record won a gold award and remains one of the classics of modern popular music.
sentences.translation: 该唱片获得过金奖，而且依旧是现代流行音乐的经典作品之一。

sentences.sentence: In addition to the classics, the new e-books will include a host of Rough Guide titles.
sentences.translation: 除了经典著作，新的电子图书将包括大量出版社的图书品种。

sentences.sentence: It was law or classics – I mean English or classics.
sentences.translation: 那是法律或者古典文学–我是说，英语或者古典文学。
